#summary General instructions on installing PyOpenCV on Windows.

Right now, only gcc 4.x compilers are supported, which include TDM GCC and MinGW.

=Using MinGW or TDM GCC=

==Install OpenCV 2.0==

Willow Garage's pre-compiled OpenCV 2.0 builds for Windows are not suitable for PyOpenCV. It is very likely that you have to build OpenCV 2.0 from source for your own, or download one of my pre-compiled OpenCV 2.0 builds on the Downloads page.
